backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI update to show a user-uploaded image in App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, tailwind config, and HTML entry.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, theming, and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component showing a playful Valentine UI with a moving 'No' button and a reveal view displaying a user-uploaded image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and persistent identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles with custom OKLCH color system, animations, and base typography for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that initializes React, wraps the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the themed UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema, current version, feature list, and architectural notes for a single‑page Valentine web app, including behavior, design, and asset requirements. Contains no code, only project metadata and feature specifications.
